nodes.text: The Dee'ja Peak Capitol was the building situated in Dee'ja Peak that served as the city's capitol. The capitol building was in operation by the time of the Galactic Civil War following the Battle of Yavin in 0 BBY, and was controlled by the Galactic Empire.
The Dee'ja Peak Capitol was a location in the 2003 massively multiplayer online role-playing game Star Wars Galaxies: An Empire Divided, prior to the game's closure on December 15, 2011.
